title: Cant log into my account
body: I cant log in to my account. it said "We are unable to log you in because you may be offline". PLS HELP WHAT HAPPENED TO MY ACC

replies.body:
Help is here, and your account is fine!  This is an issue we're investigating per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page!  This issue specifically seems to happen if you try to re-log while already in a game.  This workaround should help:  

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.
